QuestData.Title: Something in the Water
QuestData.Description: There is something fouling these waters, $c.$b$bWe will need to purify the waters in order to restore balance to the elemental forces below this ruin.$b$bThe magic here has warped the elementals and they are beyond restoration. Release their corrupted forms so that they may be reborn pure.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that we have cleared out the corruption the fresh water elementals will be able to flourish.
